page.title: 03 My Day (2)
page.content:
9.00 am Once in school I got my books ready for my first lesson. We had the register and Mrs Burdett asked for children to get their dinner or snack tickets from Mrs Lowe's office.
9.15 am Then off we went to our first lesson which was science. In science we had to measure our height and weight to see how much we had grown in three months.
10.45 am After science it was playtime. At playtime I ate my crisps and then I talked to Elizabeth and Amy. Then the bell went and I went in for my next lesson.
